long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your PlayStation wishlist with ease.

Sony removed the wishlist feature from their webstore. 
This is the alternative you are looking for.

- Easily include/exclude any game directly from the PlayStation Store
- Sort games by Price / Date Added or Drag-and-Drop your own order
- Sync your Wishlist across all your devices
- No account, password, or authentication required

# How to use
- Install the extension
- Go to a game page in the Playstation store
- Click on the Wishlist icon on your Chrome toolbar
